directions: Add shrimp, eggs, carrots, onion, salt, and pepper to the bowl of a food processor.  Pulse until just combined.  Blend mayonnaise with lemon juice and mustard; mix into shrimp mixture with a fork.
Core tomatoes. Cut into quarters without cutting all the way to the bottom. Place each tomato on a lettuce leaf, and open.  Spoon shrimp mixture into the center.  Serve
title: Tomatoes with Seafood Dressing
